9865.quoteText:
Welcome! These terms of use are deliberately written in non-legalistic human-friendly language.
Please take a spin through them! They're made to make your experience better, and to help you understand our philosophy and values.
9865.title: The terms for this service are easy to read

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read

9866.quoteText: If you think they can be improved, don't hesitate to submit a pull request (you can do that without special software), preferably to the English version.
9866.title: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

tosdr.case: User feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

9867.quoteText: We store visitor logs for up to 90 days.
9867.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

9868.quoteText:
We may be required to respond to legal requests for user information (e.g., due to a subpoena).
In those cases, we will notify you wherever reasonable,
9868.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

tosdr.case: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

9869.quoteText: and will resist requests we consider to be invalid.
9869.title: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible

tosdr.case: The service will resist legal requests for user information where reasonably possible
tosdr.tldr: full paragraph: "We may be required to respond to legal requests for user information (e.g., due to a subpoena). In those cases, we will notify you wherever reasonable, and will resist requests we consider to be invalid." -- last partial clause is the one taken to support this point.

9870.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

9871.quoteText: If you violate our rules, the site moderators (most likely volunteers like yourself) may temporarily or permanently ban you, or may temporarily suspend specific privileges.
9871.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

9872.quoteText: You can't post any content that would be illegal to distribute under United States law, and we may be legally and morally obligated to report such uses to the authorities in certain cases.
9872.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit illegal content

9873.quoteText: Similarly, you're not permitted to perform actions on the site that are illegal under United States law.
9873.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

tosdr.case: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

9874.quoteText:
It's fine to criticize ideas, and indeed we support forming groups around topics like "anti-nuclear power" or "pro-nuclear power".
But we will never tolerate the use of this platform to spread hatred.
9874.title: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies

tosdr.case: The service provides information about its attitude towards ethical, social or political problems or controversies

9876.quoteText:
The work we do here is intended to be shared and built upon, and to be made available to the world indefinitely.
As a consequence, whether explicitly stated in every context or not, by publishing information through this site you agree to do it under appropriate free licenses.
9876.title: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one

tosdr.case: Content is published under a free license instead of a bilateral one
